sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./Coaches.scss"; import validation from "./general/validation"; const Coaches = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ email: "", password: "", }); const [errors, setErrors] = useState({ email: "", password: "", }); const changeHandler = (e) => { setValues({ ...values, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setErrors(validation(values)); console.log(values); axios .post("http://localhost:3000/users/add/", values) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)); setValues({ email: "", password: "", }); }; return (
submitHandler(e)} className="CoachesForm">

Coach online

Earn money on your schedule

changeHandler(e)} /> {errors.email &&

{errors.email}

} changeHandler(e)} /> {errors.password &&

{errors.password}
